org.deeplearning4j.core.storage

Interface StatsStorageRouter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StatsStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCollectionStatsStorage, CollectionStatsStorageRouter, FileStatsStorage, InMemoryStatsStorage, J7FileStatsStorage, MapDBStatsStorage, RemoteUIStatsStorageRouter, VanillaStatsStorageRouter

    public interface StatsStorageRouter
    StatsStorageRouter is intended to route static info, metadata and updates somewhere - generally to a StatsStorage implementation. For example, a StatsStorageRouter might serialize and send objects over a network.
    Author:
    Alex Black

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • putStorageMetaData

        void putStorageMetaData(StorageMetaData storageMetaData)
        Method to store some additional metadata for each session. Idea: record the classes used to serialize and deserialize the static info and updates (as a class name). This is mainly used for debugging and validation.
        Parameters:
        storageMetaData - Storage metadata to store

      • putStorageMetaData

        void putStorageMetaData(Collection<? extends StorageMetaData> storageMetaData)

        Parameters:
